alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northeastern Nye County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 3:09AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS THROUGH FRIDAY FOLLOWED BY COLD TEMPS... Another system will arrive later today bringing more snow showers that will last into Friday. Around an inch or less expected, with 1-3 inches possible across some of the valleys across eastern Nevada. Mountains could see 3-6+ inches. Breezy winds could lead to blowing and drifting snow as well. While the holiday weekend looks to be on the drier side, much colder temperatures are expected with highs only in the 20s to low 30s. Nighttime lows expected to dip into the single digits to single digits below zero Friday and Saturday night. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
